comments:
build 20020611

-copy a file to its parent folder
->you are prompted for a new name
-cancel the dialog
->an OperationCanceledException is logged

This is caused by CopyFilesAndFoldersOperation.getNewNameFor throwing an 
OperationCanceledException inside a Display.syncExec block. The exception is 
caught by a Workbench exception handler and not by the caller of getNewName as 
intended.
The fix is to throw the exception when the syncExec has finished.

Build F3.  I get the spew to the java.exe DOS window and lots of it without 
much effort at all.
